entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning and ending late this afternoon. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
